author: senh
title: Fire Sparks in Carnival Cruise Ship Engine Room
text: BING NEWS: Fire Sparks in Carnival Liberty Cruise Ship Engine Room Passengers and crew aboard a Caribbean Carnival Cruise through the holiday weekend got a scare Monday when a fire broke out in one of the ship's engine rooms. No one was injured in the fire, which sparked while the 952-foot-long Carnival Liberty was docked ... 09/7/2015 - 9:52 am | View Link Fire sparks aboard Carnival Liberty Crews responded to a fire aboard the Carnival Liberty docked in St. Thomas Monday, according to officials with Carnival Liberty. While the Carnival Liberty was docked in St. Thomas, there was a fire in the ship's engine room, officials said. There were no ... 09/7/2015 - 8:46 am | View Link Freedom of the Seas Fire: A Word From Your Captain The captain of the Freedom of the Seas, Captain Ron Holmes ... Captain Holmes says that the fire erupted from what he describes as the engine spaces.
